docs.snippet: Gov. Rick Perry’s back-seat public role in the Ebola drama was an unlikely position for an assertive, hands-on executive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry’s back-seat public role in the Ebola drama was an unlikely position for an assertive, hands-on executive.
docs.abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry ends his back-seat public role in Ebola drama and holds news conference in Austin expressing his support for a travel ban for people coming into United States from West African countries that are at epicenter of Ebola outbreak; praises state's response to cases in Dallas.

headline.main: Health Scare in Texas Also Sends Political Ripples
headline.print_headline: Health Scare in Texas Also Sends Political Ripples
